price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߞߎߡߊ ߟߊߛߋ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߟߋ߬ ߝߋߎ߫ ߛߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߫
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ وَصَّلۡنَا لَهُمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad waṣṣalnā lahumu al-qawla laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
